basic.Peptide Name: Grammistin Pp3 (Group III grammistin; fish, chordates, animals)
basic.Target Organism: [Ref.Fish. Sci. 2001 Oct;67:928-933.]Gram-positive bacteria:Bacillus subtilis IAM 1026 (MIC=50 µg/ml), Staphylococcus aureus IAM 1011 (MIC=50 µg/ml);Gram-negative bacteria:Aeromonas salmonicida NCIBM 1102 (MIC=50 µg/ml), Escherichia coli JCM 1649 (MIC>50 µg/ml), P. dameselae subsp. Piscicida Sp 9587 (MIC=25 µg/ml), Salmonella typhimurium S1 (MIC>50 µg/ml), S. putrefaciens IAM 1509 (MIC=12.5 µg/ml), Vibrio anguillarum NCIBM 829 (MIC=50 µg/ml), Vibrio parahaemolyticus (MIC=50 µg/ml).
